Great game the work in this game is amazing valve is great at making games and this one deserves a golden star >:) it is harder then csgo in the terms of gameplay so it makes a perfect trainer and there are servers that play funny gamemodes or fun ones hands down just a game anyone can enjoy tons of people still play this aswell if you like shooters or just fun games in general GET THIS GAME i can even say how great this game is just try it for yourself also there may not be many servers but it is a great game to play with friends you can make your own server and play theres a couple of differences between this and csgo csgo is something great yes but i perfer this if you wanna chill and just play a nice game csgo is pretty weird in the sense of public games now i know i dont have good grammer for this review but it doesnt matter i just wanted to make a review i hope to see you guys comment :) B Reaper....
